entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a Squib, as revealed by Harry Potter. He is uncomfortable about being known as a Squib.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who saw Filch's Kwikspell letter and is accused of being in the wrong place at the wrong time.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher who doubts Harry's innocence and suggests that there are suspicious circumstances surrounding his presence in the upstairs corridor.

entities.name: hallowe'en feast
entities.description: The Hallowe'en feast is an event where students gather to celebrate. Harry Potter and his friends were expected to attend but were instead found in the upstairs corridor.

entities.name: kwikspell letter
entities.description: Filch's Kwikspell letter is a document that reveals his identity as a Squib. Harry Potter saw this letter on the wall.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is someone who Filch is defending himself against accusations of touching her.

entities.name: lockharts
entities.description: The Lockharts are a family whose portraits are on the walls. Harry Potter feels uncomfortable about being looked at by them.

entities.name: ron and hermione
entities.description: Ron and Hermione are friends of Harry Potter who launch into an explanation with him to defend themselves against Snape's accusations.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is accused by Filch of being a Squib and seeing his Kwikspell letter.
Snape doubts Harry's innocence in the suspicious circumstances surrounding his presence in the upstairs corridor.
Filch owns the Kwikspell letter that was seen by Harry Potter on the wall.
